wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant-General Sir Ralph Bouverie Deedes, KCB, OBE, MC (17 October 1890 – 3 March 1954) was a British officer who served in the Indian Army.

response: *Ralph Bouverie Deedes, K.C.B., O.B.E., M.C. (1890–1954), senior officer in the pre-partition Indian Army
